Literature.Title: A mixed chirality α-helix in a stapled bicyclic and a linear antimicrobial peptide revealed by X-ray crystallography.
Literature.Author: Baeriswyl S, Personne H, Di Bonaventura I, Köhler T, van Delden C, Stocker A, Javor S, Reymond JL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM1.A(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ZEM9.A(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae Oxa-48(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli W3110(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii BAL225(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=4µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus COL(MIC=4µg/ml)
